original_text: passes along to Azmon, goes out by the Brook of Egypt, and comes to its end at the sea. This shall be your south boundary.
korean_text: 거기서 아스몬에 이르러 애굽 시내로 나아가 바다에 이르러 경계의 끝이 되나니 이것이 너희 남쪽 경계가 되리라

sentences.original_text: goes out by the Brook of Egypt
and comes to its end at the sea
This shall be your south boundary
sentences.korean_translation: 이것이 너희 남쪽 경계가 될 것입니다
